weapon_exp_n.name: Weapon Battery I
weapon_exp_n.description: A portable charger for Omnium weapons that also enhances them slightly.
weapon_exp_n.source: Usable as material for upgrading weapons, providing <ComLblGreen>20</> EXP.

weapon_exp_r.name: Weapon Battery II
weapon_exp_r.description: A common charger for Omnium weapons that can slightly increase effectiveness.
weapon_exp_r.source: Usable as material for upgrading weapons, providing <ComLblGreen>75</> EXP.

weapon_exp_sr.name: Weapon Battery III
weapon_exp_sr.description: Advanced charger for Omnium weapons that can increase effectiveness.
weapon_exp_sr.source: Usable as material for upgrading weapons, providing <ComLblGreen>250</> EXP.

weapon_exp_ssr.name: Weapon Battery IV
weapon_exp_ssr.description: Premium charger for Omnium weapons that can greatly increase effectiveness.
weapon_exp_ssr.source: Usable as material for upgrading weapons, providing <ComLblGreen>1000</> EXP.

spear_ice.name: Frosted Spear
spear_ice.description: A common weapon among residents of Warren Snowfield. Infused with frost to reflect the local flavor. It's very popular, because it's cheap yet highly effective.
spear_ice.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a significant distance.
spear_ice.dodge:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.
spear_ice.skill: <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.
spear_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and grab the target upon switching to this weapon and shake them multiple times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. The last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target.

digger_physic.name: Combat Blade
digger_physic.description: A basic weapon developed by Banges Tech. Forged in a special alloy, it is light, agile, and easy to handle.
digger_physic.normal_des:
While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
digger_physic.dodge:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Keep tapping to throw up to <shuzhi>6</> more Flying Blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
digger_physic.skill: Fire <shuzhi>6</> Returning Blades in all directions, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.
digger_physic.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes orbiting blades that deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, with <shuzhi>2</> more flying blades spinning around the Wanderer to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to targets coming into contact.

sword_thunder.name: EM Blade
sword_thunder.description: The earliest electromagnetic Omnium project. The blade is easy to handle, and is very popular among Wanderers that are not great fighters.
sword_thunder.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
sword_thunder.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
sword_thunder.skill: Roam between targets, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets, with the last hit suspending the target. Immune to hitstun while active. Reduce damage dealt to the same target by <shuzhi>40%</> each time. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.
sword_thunder.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, then rush to the target and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.

While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.

bow_fire.skill: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.
bow_fire.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, and unleashes Explosive Barrage on the target upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.

While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.

stave_thunder.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>, and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus healing nearby Wanderers and allies for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

cannon_ice.name: The Terminator
cannon_ice.description: The most gnarly firearm ever created, also known as a moving turret.
cannon_ice.normal_des: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to <shuzhi>40</> rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
cannon_ice.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
cannon_ice.skill: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.
cannon_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and fire an arctic beam upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>3</>-second <shuzhi>freeze</> effect. Also reduce the target's frost resistance by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

hammer_ice.name: Pummeler
hammer_ice.description: No one wants to be on the receiving end of this maul.
hammer_ice.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
hammer_ice.dodge: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
hammer_ice.skill:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and create an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).
hammer_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> nearby targets upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Also summon a maul to fall on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.

gun_fire.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and suspend them. Immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

darts_physic.normal_des:
While on the ground, brandish the chakram to unleash 5 spinning attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
darts_physic.dodge:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Waning Moon.
Toss a spinning chakram forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target and inflicting a <shuzhi>stun</> effect for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. The chakram then splits into <shuzhi>3</> and keeps traveling, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets along their path. <red>Split chakrams will bounce during Full Bloom</>.

At the same time, enemies are pulled in, and their speed is reduced by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Fire <shuzhi>5</> chakrams that bounce between enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets along their paths, bouncing up to <shuzhi>5</> times. <red>The split chakrams triggered by Waning Moon will also bounce up to 5 times.</> Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.
darts_physic.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chakram of the Seas at a target. Struck target causes AOE <shuzhi>stun</> for <shuzhi>1</> second, plus <shuzhi>1</> attack each against up to <shuzhi>3</> units every second (each attack has <shuzhi>10%</> chance of <shuzhi>stunning</> the target for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds), dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> x ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

cube_fire.name: Negating Cube

While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> up to 3 times and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

cube_fire.dodge:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area and grants hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
If the Wanderer has less than <shuzhi>5</> cubes, each successful dodge has a <shuzhi>40%</> chance to restore 1 dodge attempt.
Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos.
<shuzhi>Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.</>
cube_fire.skill: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to <shuzhi>800%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
cube_fire.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and gain <shuzhi>5</> cubes after switching to this weapon, then unleash the <shuzhi>5</> cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>3</> seconds.

Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
dgun_thunder.dodge: Tap normal attack after dodging to <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
dgun_thunder.skill: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>-seconds.
dgun_thunder.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets within the area and dealing a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage over 3 attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for <shuzhi>3.5</> seconds and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to a target every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

ShieldAxe_Fire.name: Molten Shield V2
ShieldAxe_Fire.description: A shield axe that belongs to the V2 weapon series, a collection of weapons forged with special techniques.
ShieldAxe_Fire.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>launch the target into the air</>.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{15}</> and knock the target back.

Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flaming shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking back targets. In addition, trigger an explosion that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>stun</> targets for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Leave a large flame zone for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Shield Conversion, and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.
ShieldAxe_Fire.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or when <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleash a flame shockwave upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Taunt enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, during which gain <shuzhi>15%</> damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted. Objects last <shuzhi>20</> seconds and provide <shuzhi>10</> seconds of <shuzhi>5%</> damage reduction (stackable), restoring dodge by 1.

The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.

When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered,<shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the wielder</> and launch a massive salvo of missiles upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

Immortal_thunder.name: Alaya
Immortal_thunder.description: Bai Yuekui's personal blade. The exquisite blade hints at the potent energy within.
Immortal_thunder.normal_des:
Initiate 5 attacks in a row when on the ground.
The first attack deals<shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage plus minor knockback.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage plus knockback.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> x ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> damage plus minor knockback.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> damage plus airborne.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> damage plus <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target.
Immortal_thunder.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
Immortal_thunder.skill:
Move forward rapidly and grab the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Vs. Restrainable Target: </><shuzhi>Hold</> and smash the target to the ground to deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and suspend the target, plus inflicting all targets in the area with <shuzhi>cupping strikes</>.
<shuzhi>Vs. Unrestrainable Target: </>Confine target (no movement only) and deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and knockback, plus inflicting all targets in the area with <shuzhi>cupping strikes</>.
Gain hyperbody and immunity to control during movement, and unaffected by any damage or debuff during the grab.
<shuzhi>Suction Cups: Explode in </><shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage plus <shuzhi>knockdown</>, and additional <shuzhi>10%</> to all damage dealt to the target for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive: You can reuse the skill in 5 seconds if it misses the target, but with a longer cooldown afterward (30 seconds).</>
Immortal_thunder.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, changing to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>, Alaya projects a big force field, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</>x ATK +<shuzhi>{1}</> damage, confine targets in the area for <shuzhi>5</> seconds (no movement only), up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage.

Suspension_thunder.name: Venus
Suspension_thunder.description: Its designer is unknown. The special hovering EM Blaster's prototype's blueprint has been lost. It contains a unique electrical saving process in its interior. It's extremely troublesome to repair when it gets worn out, but Cobalt-B of Banges Tech seems to be able to do it.
Suspension_thunder.normal_des:
While on the ground, use Venus to attack 5 times in a row.
The first attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
The second attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The third attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
The fourth attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
The fifth attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Suspension_thunder.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
Suspension_thunder.skill: Venus fires a guided missile that explodes on contact with enemy targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking down targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
Suspension_thunder.discharge:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon will <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the user</> and command Venus to fire a cross-shaped ray at the ground, creating an unstable area and slowing targets' movement speed by <shuzhi>70%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. After a brief delay, unleash an electromagnetic burst that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Using a discharge attack will spawn <shuzhi>1</> Electrode near the enemy's position that attacks once every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The Electrode gains <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's stats, can be attacked or healed, and loses <shuzhi>3%</> of its max HP every second.
Only <shuzhi>1</> Electrode can exist at any given time, and summoning a new Electrode will replace the previous one.

Frigg_ice.name: Balmung
Frigg_ice.description: The greatsword and the saber belonging exclusively to the Angel of Clemency, Frigg. They were adapted to Frigg's cybernetic body when they were manufactured. The two weapons are not one and the same, but Frigg refers to them collectively as Balmung.
Frigg_ice.normal_des:
While on the ground, initiate 5 attacks in a row with Balmung.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.
Frigg_ice.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
Frigg_ice.skill:
Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, launching and suspending targets and gaining damage immunity while this skill is in use. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After unleashing <shuzhi>"Fimbulwinter"</>, a large Frost Domain will be formed around the Wanderer for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Dodge attempts will not be consumed while dodging with Balmung within the Frost Domain.
Grant "Domain of Frost I" when you are in the Frost Domain: When using a frost weapon, shatter is increased by <shuzhi>25%</> and frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>.
Frigg_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the user</> and dash forward upon switching to this weapon, temporarily controlling enemies in an area before unleashing a gigantic slash. Launch targets into the air and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.

funnel_fire.name: Spark
funnel_fire.description: A special weapon Lin asked Mirroria R&D to make for Ruby. Its main functions include: Acting as the housekeeper in the play-house game, waking Ruby up in the morning, and leading the way for Ruby... But most importantly, protecting Ruby.
funnel_fire.normal_des:
While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> against each target.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> against each target and <shuzhi>launches</> targets.
funnel_fire.dodge: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> against them, as well as taunting them for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).
funnel_fire.skill:
Spark fires out Sparks that last for 15 seconds and bounce between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. Sparks deal more damage the further they travel. On hit, they deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>25</>-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets with each bullet dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>30%</> more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. When Sparks hit targets burned by the Wanderer, they burn or ignite the target once and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together). The result calculation cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds and the skill cooldown is <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
"<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack deals damage, the Wanderer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a <shuzhi>0.9</>-second cooldown, for up to <shuzhi>8</> points of Heat. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Wanderer gains the effect Ultimate Heat, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
funnel_fire.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting searing energy beams at the target location before eventually exploding, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. When Sparks hits targets burned by the Wanderer, it burns or ignites the target once and deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together). The result calculation cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

Launch 5 Heartstream attacks while on the ground.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> damage to the target and launches the target into the air.
Dkatana_ice.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
Dkatana_ice.skill: Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Dkatana_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and dash toward the target with a combo attack upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.

fan_superpower.name: Shadoweave
fan_superpower.description: The initial design shows it to be a lightweight and covert concealed weapon, but it's changed to a heavy blade by the user's own request. It's heavy and not like a concealed weapon at all.
fan_superpower.normal_des:
While on the ground, use Shadoweave to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>. 
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
fan_superpower.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
fan_superpower.skill:
Create a Moonlight Realm around yourself for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Your attack in the realm is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>, jumping ability increased by <shuzhi>20%</>, and endurance consumption reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
Enter the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm. Your fall speed is greatly reduced and you can perform multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target. Upon hit, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and randomly generate <shuzhi>1–3</> epiphyllums.

Passive: In the Moonlight Realm, <shuzhi>1</> epiphyllum will be generated near 1 target every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds. 
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, an extra <shuzhi>50%</> of damage is dealt to enemies with less than <shuzhi>20%</> HP.
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, you will blink away from the target when incoming damage is detected. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Passive: Weapons Master
Flame: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 flame weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Flame: Moonlight Realm. When a target is burned while in Flame: Moonlight Realm, they are burned for an extra <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Targets with shield take an extra <shuzhi>15%</> flame damage. 

Volt: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 volt weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Volt: Moonlight Realm. While in Volt: Moonlight Realm, dodging has a <shuzhi>65%</> chance of not consuming a dodge attempt, dodge attacks deal <shuzhi>5%</> additional damage, and volt damage is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Frost: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 frost weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Frost: Moonlight Realm. While in Frost: Moonlight Realm, frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Physical: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 physical weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Physical: Moonlight Realm. While in Physical: Moonlight Realm, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within attack range every second.

Balance: When Shadoweave is paired with any two different elemental weapons (among flame, volt, frost, and physical weapons), the Wanderer's ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</> in the realm, and counted as activating flame, volt, frost, and physical resonance without resonance effects.
fan_superpower.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Gravity Weave with a stronger absorption force, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Then explode and create a ranged diffusion wave after <shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> + <shuzhi>{3}</>. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

fan_superpower_fashion.name: Shadoweave
fan_superpower_fashion.description: The initial design shows it to be a lightweight and covert concealed weapon, but it's changed to a heavy blade by the user's own request. It's heavy and not like a concealed weapon at all.

tianlang_thunder.name: Thunderbreaker
tianlang_thunder.description: This long spear covered in lightning is the SMA1-TS000-Thunderbreaker. It is able to unleash the stored power through unimaginable means. The electric field that it generates disrupts the mind of its wielder, so it cannot be mastered by ordinary people.
tianlang_thunder.normal_des: When wielding Thunderbreaker, every <shuzhi>4</> normal attacks will charge the weapon, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> charge points. After charging, any Electromancy dodge skill triggers electrocution with lightning. Lightning damage dealt equals <shuzhi>3%</> of HP lost (but no lower than <shuzhi>100%</> of Volt ATK, and no higher than <shuzhi>1,000%</> of Volt ATK), and triggers Electrified Entity, which deals area volt damage equal to <shuzhi>2%</> of HP lost (no lower than <shuzhi>40%</> of Volt ATK, and no higher than <shuzhi>400%</> of Volt ATK).
tianlang_thunder.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
tianlang_thunder.skill:
Unleash a barrage of attacks, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies within range, and transform enemies and your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Gain Volt Sense when Dubhe is used: Scan the other two equipped weapons when unleashing skills. Each additional volt weapon sensed by it increases volt ATK by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP (no less than <shuzhi>100%</> of volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>1,000%</> of volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill consumes <shuzhi>30%</> of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the consumed HP (no less than <shuzhi>400%</> volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>3,000%</> volt ATK). After <shuzhi>8</> seconds or when HP is lower than <shuzhi>10%</>, recover <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds (not affected by any healing effects). The recovery effect cannot be stacked.
tianlang_thunder.discharge:
When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>. Thunderbreaker unleashes wide-range volt damage, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and transforms enemies and your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time.

Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP (no less than <shuzhi>100%</> volt ATK, no more than <shuzhi>1,000%</> volt ATK).

When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge consumes <shuzhi>30%</> of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to <shuzhi>45%</> of the consumed HP (no less than <shuzhi>400%</> of volt ATK and no more than <shuzhi>3,000%</> of volt ATK). After <shuzhi>8</> seconds or when HP is lower than <shuzhi>10%</>, recover <shuzhi>5%</> missing HP every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect is not stackable.

arm_physic.name: Vesper
arm_physic.description: A support weapon personalized for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.
arm_physic.normal_des:
<ComLblGreen>Enlightenment</>: Upon hit, Normal Vesper Attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to the targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you carry × <shuzhi>2.1%</> of ATK (no more than 12.6% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.

Upon hit, Normal Vesper Attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to the targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry × <shuzhi>1.5%</> of ATK (no more than 12% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.
<ComLblGreen>Glowing</>: Upon hit, all normal Vesper attacks recover HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Vesper's Aerial Discharge and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge to shield shattering.
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>15%</> loss of HP or every <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge gained, obtain up to <shuzhi>5</> Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guard lasts for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. If your own Enlightenment Guards are full, the new Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>48%</> of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.
arm_physic.dodge: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after unleashing <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.
arm_physic.skill:
<ComLblGreen>Forgiveness Guard</>: When the healing effect overflows, gain an HP Shield equal to up to <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: The skill is replaced with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>, and the Wanderer earns no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn 1 Forgiveness Guard for each <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP healed, and grant up to 1 Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also, increase Max HP by <shuzhi>10%</> for self and teammates. Unstackable.
<ComLblGreen>Attack Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Fortitude Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP per second for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Balance Guard</>: When HP is more than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>. When HP is less than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>10%</>.
arm_physic.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

arm_physic_imitation.name: Vesper
arm_physic_imitation.description: A support weapon personalized for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.
arm_physic_imitation.normal_des:
While on the ground, use a dagger and handgun to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> in total.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> in total.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> in total.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> in total, and knocks back targets.
arm_physic_imitation.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
arm_physic_imitation.skill:
The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.
arm_physic_imitation.discharge:
When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered,<shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the wielder</> and launch a massive salvo of missiles upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

arm_physic_imitationlv3.description: A support weapon personalized for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.

When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered,<shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the wielder</> and launch a massive salvo of missiles upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

CubeFireImitation1.name: Negating Cube
CubeFireImitation1.description: Users of the Strange Cube tend to think of many ways to negate unnecessary requirements.
CubeFireImitation1.normal_des:
While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> up to 3 times and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
<shuzhi>Passive: If normal attacks hit targets 6 times, gain 1 cube. Up to 5 cubes can be stored.</>
CubeFireImitation1.dodge:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area and grants hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
If the Wanderer has less than <shuzhi>5</> cubes, each successful dodge has a <shuzhi>40%</> chance to restore 1 dodge attempt.
Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos.
<shuzhi>Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.</>
CubeFireImitation1.skill: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to <shuzhi>800%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
CubeFireImitation1.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and gain <shuzhi>5</> cubes after switching to this weapon, then unleash the <shuzhi>5</> cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>3</> seconds.

HammerIceImitation2.name: Pummeler
HammerIceImitation2.description: No one wants to be on the receiving end of this maul.
HammerIceImitation2.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
HammerIceImitation2.dodge: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
HammerIceImitation2.skill:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and create an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).
HammerIceImitation2.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> nearby targets upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Also summon a maul to fall on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.

iceblade_ice.name: Unyielding Wing
iceblade_ice.description: Combat armor crafted with a foot-blade as its core. Powered by the user's mental energy, it is the result of cutting-edge science and technology from before the Cataclysm, and explodes with terrifying power when necessary.
iceblade_ice.normal_des:
While on the ground, use Unyielding Wing to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.
iceblade_ice.dodge: After dodging backwards, tap normal attack 3 times consecutively to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target with the first hit.
iceblade_ice.skill:
Pull nearby targets together, then deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to them and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Gain hyperbody while the skill is active.
<red>Passive</>: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal frost damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> 1 time and slow the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every <shuzhi>12</> times the Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice 1 time, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>1 time to targets in the space every 2 seconds for <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).
iceblade_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

iceblade_ice_lv3.name: Unyielding Wing
iceblade_ice_lv3.description: Combat armor crafted with a foot-blade as its core. Powered by the user's mental energy, it is the result of cutting-edge science and technology from before the Cataclysm, and explodes with terrifying power when necessary.

gun_fireLV3.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
gun_fireLV3.skill: Constant fire in a frontal cone area to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
gun_fireLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes <shuzhi>3</> grenades forward, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> AOE damage and causing <shuzhi>launch</>.

sickle_fireLV3.name: Scythe of the Crow
sickle_fireLV3.description: A powerful scythe, great for both offense and defense. Able to instantly kill its target within a certain distance.
sickle_fireLV3.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.
sickle_fireLV3.dodge:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and pull in nearby enemies.
sickle_fireLV3.skill: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.
sickle_fireLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and create a Flaming Scythe upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Additionally, spawn Flaming Scythes Domain every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. The scythes summon volcanic eruptions from the ground, which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets and suspend them.

Snipe_fire.name: Clover Cross
Snipe_fire.description: The official operation team of a VR multiplayer online shooting game that is incredibly popular in Mirroria specially designed this exclusive gun for their top player from a certain season. The customized physical model of the gun was also sent to the champion, but nobody realized it could be used just like in the game...
Snipe_fire.normal_des:
While on the ground, attack 3 times in a row with the sniper rifle.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.
Snipe_fire.dodge:
Leap backward and throw 1 grenade forward, which detonates upon hitting the ground, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets and suspending them in the air.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Tapping normal attack after using Twilight Arc instantly fires a fully charged Cross Snipe.
Snipe_fire.skill:
Switch modules to change the effects of Cross Snipe and Twilight Arc. Cross Snipe can be used up to <shuzhi>8</> times. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.
 <shuzhi>Ruthless Bomb</>: The effect of Cross Snipe becomes a flame explosion that deals basic damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> within an area. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>. Upon hitting targets that are not burning, inflict them with Cross Burn, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>120%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>13</> seconds. Upon hitting burning targets, inflict them with Cross Burn, and enter Burn Enhancement for <shuzhi>20</> seconds, which increases burn damage on targets by <shuzhi>20%</>. When using Twilight Arc, you now throw <shuzhi>3</> grenades instead.
 <shuzhi>Deceitful Bomb</>: Changes the effects of Cross Snipe into a ranged Gas attack that deals basic damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> upon hit. After charging, deal up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>. Targets in the Gas will be slowed. The slow effect becomes stronger over time, and the Gas lasts <shuzhi>7</> seconds. Twilight Arc can detonate the Gas (the longer the charge, the greater the Gas explosion damage), dealing explosion damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> (this is deemed as triggering Cross Snipe 1 time) and reducing the target's flame resistance by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
 
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After confirming the module, you will get a number of Optical Enhancement uses. Optical Enhancement: Reduces the charging time of Cross Snipe by <shuzhi>30%</>, becoming immune to damage while charging. Recover <shuzhi>1</> dodge attempt (up to <shuzhi>4</> dodge attempts) every <shuzhi>2</> dodges.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: While the Deceitful Bomb Module is in effect, Cross Snipe has a chance of reducing the cooldown of other flame weapon skills by <shuzhi>0.7</> seconds after hitting a target.
Snipe_fire.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and throws an incendiary bomb that can be detonated by firing at it, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

stave_iceLV3.name: Absolute Zero
stave_iceLV3.description: Keep the cold temperature steady to heal allies.
stave_iceLV3.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
stave_iceLV3.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
stave_iceLV3.skill: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> once every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.
stave_iceLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>, and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus healing nearby Wanderers and allies for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

sword_physicLV3.name: Guren Blade
sword_physicLV3.description: The crimson blade stands for courage and resolve, while the sharp edge carries out justice.
sword_physicLV3.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
sword_physicLV3.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
sword_physicLV3.skill: Dance through targets while swinging the blade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets (consecutive hits on the same target deal <shuzhi>20%</> reduced damage). After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and suspend them. Immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
sword_physicLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, who then rushes to and <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> a target, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> damage, while gaining immunity to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.name: Molten Shield V2
ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.description: A shield axe that belongs to the V2 weapon series, a collection of weapons forged with special techniques.
ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>launch the target into the air</>.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{15}</> and knock the target back.
ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.dodge:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flame shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. Trigger an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. The explosion inflicts a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> on the target, and for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, reduces the target's healing received by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Form: Swing the axe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and reducing the target's healing received for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds by <shuzhi>30%</>.
ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.skill:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form and smash the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target. Leave a large flame zone for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Shield Conversion, and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.
ShieldAxe_FireImitationLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or when <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleash a flame shockwave upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Taunt enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, during which gain <shuzhi>15%</> damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted. Objects last <shuzhi>20</> seconds and provide <shuzhi>10</> seconds of <shuzhi>5%</> damage reduction (stackable), restoring dodge by 1.

Frigg_iceLV3.name: Balmung
Frigg_iceLV3.description: The greatsword and the saber belonging exclusively to the Angel of Clemency, Frigg. They were adapted to Frigg's cybernetic body when they were manufactured. The two weapons are not one and the same, but Frigg refers to them collectively as Balmung.
Frigg_iceLV3.normal_des:
While on the ground, initiate 5 attacks in a row with Balmung.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.
Frigg_iceLV3.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
Frigg_iceLV3.skill:
Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, launching and suspending targets and gaining damage immunity while this skill is in use. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After unleashing <shuzhi>"Fimbulwinter"</>, a large Frost Domain will be formed around the Wanderer for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Dodge attempts will not be consumed while dodging with Balmung within the Frost Domain.
Grant "Domain of Frost I" when you are in the Frost Domain: When using a frost weapon, shatter is increased by <shuzhi>25%</> and frost ATK is increased by <shuzhi>15%</>.
Frigg_iceLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the user</> and dash forward upon switching to this weapon, temporarily controlling enemies in an area before unleashing a gigantic slash. Launch targets into the air and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.

arm_physicLV3.name: Vesper
arm_physicLV3.description: Commander exclusive Heavy System, extensively modified by the Lighthouse for combat purposes.
arm_physicLV3.normal_des:
<ComLblGreen>Enlightenment</>: Upon hit, Normal Vesper Attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to the targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you carry × <shuzhi>2.1%</> of ATK (no more than 12.6% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.

Upon hit, Normal Vesper Attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to the targets bearing the <shuzhi>Enlightenment mark</>, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry × <shuzhi>1.5%</> of ATK (no more than 12% × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.
<ComLblGreen>Glowing</>: Upon hit, all normal Vesper attacks recover HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Vesper's Aerial Discharge and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge to shield shattering.
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>15%</> loss of HP or every <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge gained, obtain up to <shuzhi>5</> Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guard lasts for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. If your own Enlightenment Guards are full, the new Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>48%</> of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.
arm_physicLV3.dodge: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after unleashing <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.
arm_physicLV3.skill:
<ComLblGreen>Forgiveness Guard</>: When the healing effect overflows, gain an HP Shield equal to up to <shuzhi>25%</> of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: The skill is replaced with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>, and the Wanderer earns no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn 1 Forgiveness Guard for each <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP healed, and grant up to 1 Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also, increase Max HP by <shuzhi>10%</> for self and teammates. Unstackable.
<ComLblGreen>Attack Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of Max HP. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Fortitude Guard</>: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP per second for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
<ComLblGreen>Balance Guard</>: When HP is more than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase shatter by <shuzhi>20%</>. When HP is less than <shuzhi>50%</>, increase final damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and shatter by <shuzhi>10%</>.
arm_physicLV3.discharge: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

TestMark.normal_des:
While on the ground, use a dagger and handgun to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> in total.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> in total.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> in total.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> in total, and knocks back targets.
TestMark.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
TestMark.skill:
The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.
TestMark.discharge:
When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered,<shuzhi>clear all debuffs from the wielder</> and launch a massive salvo of missiles upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.name: Staff of Scars
breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.description: A mechanical staff with a cross rune carved into it. Capable of both forgiving sins or unleashing punishments.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.skill: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{4}</> every second and reduce their damage taken by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_stave_thunder.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</>, and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus healing nearby Wanderers and allies for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.name: The Terminator
breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.description: The most gnarly firearm ever created, also known as a moving turret.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.normal_des: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to <shuzhi>40</> rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.skill: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_cannon_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and fire an arctic beam upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>3</>-second <shuzhi>freeze</> effect. Also reduce the target's frost resistance by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.name: Pummeler
breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.description: No one wants to be on the receiving end of this maul.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.dodge: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.skill:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and create an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).
breakfate_weapon_ssr_hammer_ice.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> nearby targets upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Also summon a maul to fall on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.

breakfate_weapon_ssr_digger_thunder.skill: Fire <shuzhi>6</> returning blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Gains <shuzhi>hyperbody</> for up to <shuzhi>8</> seconds, and the effect is removed when the blades return. <shuzhi>45</> -second cooldown.

breakfate_weapon_ssr_sword_physic.normal_des:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
